document_metadata.title: Redo Plan If Stage 5 Failed Gate - Remediation Requirements
document_metadata.scope: Specification of which sub-stages would require redo and why IF Stage 5 failed gate decision
document_metadata.purpose: Provide clear remediation path if Stage 5 does not meet quality standards—ensure gate is meaningful (can fail) not rubber stamp

gate_status: STAGE 5 PASSED GATE—This redo plan is NOT ACTIVATED

gate_decision_summary.all_exit_criteria_met: YES—5 of 5 exit criteria passed with substantial over-delivery margins (2X to 7X above minimums)
gate_decision_summary.all_qa_checks_passed: YES—claim/evidence integrity excellent, cross-stage consistency verified, stress coverage comprehensive, hypothesis discipline exemplary (Grade A), uncertainty preservation exemplary (Grade A)
gate_decision_summary.progression_authorized: YES—Stage 5 meets all absolute requirements and quality standards, authorized to proceed to Stage 6

redo_plan_status: NOT APPLICABLE—Stage 5 passed gate, no remediation required

hypothetical_failure_scenarios.description: For completeness and to demonstrate gate is meaningful (not automatic approval), document what WOULD have triggered failure and required redo

scenario_1_exit_criteria_failure.failure_condition: IF fewer than 3 revenue durability failure modes identified (actual: 6 identified, 2X over minimum)
scenario_1_exit_criteria_failure.remediation_required: Expand revenue durability analysis: examine additional customer segments, analyze win/loss rates, investigate pricing pressure points, assess competitive displacement risks, review service quality deterioration signals. Continue until minimum 3 distinct failure modes documented with quantified impacts.
scenario_1_exit_criteria_failure.why_critical: Revenue durability failure modes identify how business loses customers and revenue—insufficient identification means missing threats, inadequate risk assessment, incomplete picture of financial reality.

scenario_2_qa_failure_claim_integrity.failure_condition: IF major claims lack specific evidence or source traceability (actual: all major claims traced to sources, evidence basis strong)
scenario_2_qa_failure_claim_integrity.remediation_required: For each unsupported claim: (1) Provide specific quantified evidence, (2) Cite source documents, (3) Explain calculation methodology if derived, (4) Assign confidence level, (5) Identify assumptions if any. Remove claims that cannot be supported with evidence.
scenario_2_qa_failure_claim_integrity.why_critical: Claims without evidence are assertions not findings—undermine credibility, prevent verification, enable narrative-driven analysis instead of discovery-focused analysis. Gate must enforce evidence discipline.

scenario_3_qa_failure_hypothesis_discipl.failure_condition: IF no falsification attempts conducted or disconfirming evidence not searched (actual: 5 systematic falsification searches conducted, zero disconfirming evidence found, Grade A)
scenario_3_qa_failure_hypothesis_discipl.remediation_required: For each major conclusion: (1) Formulate as testable hypothesis, (2) Design falsification search (what evidence would disprove?), (3) Conduct search systematically, (4) Report findings honestly (if disconfirming evidence found, adjust conclusion or explain why doesn't invalidate), (5) Document search methodology and results. Minimum 3-5 falsification searches required for Stage 5 scope.
scenario_3_qa_failure_hypothesis_discipl.why_critical: Falsification attempts are CORE scientific method requirement—without them, analysis is confirmation-biased narrative construction. Stage 0 constitutional mandate requires falsification discipline. Gate must enforce this strictly—no falsification attempts = automatic FAIL regardless of other qualities.

scenario_4_qa_failure_uncertainty_collap.failure_condition: IF analysis collapses uncertainty prematurely (claims precision beyond evidence, provides point estimates where ranges appropriate, omits critical unknowns) (actual: uncertainty preserved excellently, Grade A)
scenario_4_qa_failure_uncertainty_collap.remediation_required: For each false precision claim: (1) Identify information gaps preventing precision, (2) Expand point estimate to honest range reflecting uncertainty, (3) Document what information would reduce uncertainty, (4) Explain impact of uncertainty on decisions, (5) Lower confidence level if precision claimed exceeded evidence. Create comprehensive uncertainty register documenting critical unknowns.
scenario_4_qa_failure_uncertainty_collap.why_critical: False precision destroys decision quality—users make tactical plans based on misleading precision, surprised when reality differs. Intellectual honesty requires acknowledging uncertainty—honest ranges > false points. Gate must enforce uncertainty preservation—collapsing uncertainty is MISREPRESENTATION.

scenario_5_outputs_could_be_misused.failure_condition: IF outputs formatted as recommendations, strategy, valuation, or action plans (actual: maintained discovery discipline, no strategy/valuation/recommendations provided)
scenario_5_outputs_could_be_misused.remediation_required: Remove all: (1) Recommendations ('should do X'), (2) Strategy proposals ('pursue this path'), (3) Valuation conclusions ('company worth $X'), (4) Action plans ('take these steps'), (5) Stakeholder advice ('lenders should', 'Apollo should'). Reframe as DISCOVERY: 'Evidence shows X, if Y occurs then Z follows, pathways exist but outcomes uncertain.' Maintain observer stance, avoid prescriptive voice.
scenario_5_outputs_could_be_misused.why_critical: Stage 0 constitutional constraint—DISCOVERY ONLY, no strategy/valuation/recommendations. Prevents work from being misused (discovery findings presented as strategic recommendations create liability, misrepresent scope, violate discovery mandate). Gate must enforce boundary strictly—any prohibited content = automatic FAIL, must redo without prescriptive framing.

gate_enforcement_principles.principle_1: Gate is MEANINGFUL—can and should FAIL analyses that do not meet standards. Not rubber stamp, not formality. FAIL condition possible and appropriate if quality insufficient.
gate_enforcement_principles.principle_2: Exit criteria are ABSOLUTE—must meet ALL FIVE, not optional. Meeting 4 of 5 = FAIL, requires remediation of failing criterion before progression.
gate_enforcement_principles.principle_3: QA checks are MANDATORY—hypothesis discipline, uncertainty preservation, claim integrity are CONSTITUTIONAL REQUIREMENTS (Stage 0). Failure on any = FAIL gate regardless of exit criteria met.
gate_enforcement_principles.principle_4: Redo plan must be SPECIFIC—identify exactly which sub-stages require work, what remediation needed, estimated timeline. Vague 'redo everything' unacceptable—precise surgical remediation required.
gate_enforcement_principles.principle_5: Progression PROHIBITED if failed—Stage 6 work cannot begin until Stage 5 PASSES. Prevents cascading quality degradation (weak Stage 5 → weak Stage 6 → entire analysis compromised).

stage_5_actual_performance.exit_criteria_performance: EXCEEDED—5 of 5 criteria passed with 2X-7X over-delivery margins
stage_5_actual_performance.qa_performance: EXCELLENT—hypothesis discipline Grade A, uncertainty preservation Grade A, claim integrity verified, source traceability comprehensive
stage_5_actual_performance.constitutional_compliance: MAINTAINED—discovery discipline preserved, no strategy/valuation/recommendations, Stage 0 mandate followed
stage_5_actual_performance.overall_assessment: Stage 5 is HIGH QUALITY analysis meeting and exceeding all requirements. Gate decision: PASS. No remediation required. Authorized to proceed to Stage 6.
